Old but gold, easy to play but hard to master. good for start at fps game with many level bot for practice. Enjoy with friend, It can play in tactical way  with friends (5 VS 5), even you has only one friend can still play with your best friend in wingman mode (2 VS 2) or enjoy solo in free style deathmatch game

Very nice game, haven't played a lot but I give it at least a 5/7. Would recommend to others and play it as well. 
However, if you don't like destroying your monitor out of rage and having to go buy a new one everytime you play csgo, i would not recommend it. So either a 5/7 or a 124/175. If you do buy it, just remember that everyone better than you is a hacker and everyone worst than you is a silver scrub and a noob.
